00036 #include "TargetedCellKiller.hpp"
00037 
00038 template<unsigned DIM>
00039 TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::TargetedCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation, unsigned targetedIndex, bool bloodLust)
00040 : AbstractCellKiller<DIM>(pCellPopulation),
00041   mTargetIndex(targetedIndex),
00042   mBloodLust(bloodLust)
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 template<unsigned DIM>
00047 unsigned TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::GetTargetIndex() const
00048 {
00049     return mTargetIndex;
00050 }
00051 
00052 template<unsigned DIM>
00053 unsigned TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::GetBloodLust() const
00054 {
00055     return mBloodLust;
00056 }
00057 
00058 template<unsigned DIM>
00059 void TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::CheckAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00060 {
00061     if ( !mBloodLust || this->mpCellPopulation->GetNumRealCells()==0 || this->mpCellPopulation->GetNumRealCells()<mTargetIndex+1)
00062     {
00063         return;
00064     }
00065     this->mpCellPopulation->GetCellUsingLocationIndex(mTargetIndex)->Kill();
00066     mBloodLust = false;
00067 }
00068 
00069 template<unsigned DIM>
00070 void TargetedCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00071 {
00072     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<TargetIndex>" << mTargetIndex << "</TargetIndex>\n";
00073     *rParamsFile << "\t\t\t<BloodLust>" << mBloodLust << "</BloodLust>\n";
00074 
00075     // Call method on direct parent class
00076     AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00077 }
00078

00083 template class TargetedCellKiller<1>;
00084 template class TargetedCellKiller<2>;
00085 template class TargetedCellKiller<3>;
